Profile Perceptual Computing Software Intern','771980','Job Description: Candidates will be working on path finding, development, optimization and profiling of advanced algorithms and software stacks in Computer Cognitive space toward enabling Intel Architecture in various horizontal IOTG segments. In this role, a successful candidate will be able to implement a proof of concept for existing solutions and arrive at an optimized solution using Intel CPU, GPU and other available accelerators. The candidate must be able to validate profiling information indicating the performance and accuracy of the pipeline at each stage. Candidate is expected to be able to work independently and identify and drive an optimization plan to completion resulting in a highly efficient software to be executable in Windows and Linux operating systems.','!*!You must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position. Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates. Experience listed below would be obtained through a combination of your school work/classes/research and/or relevant previous job and/or internship experiences. Minimum Qualifications: - Must be pursuing a MS or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science or other science/engineering related field.- 6 months minimum experience in software development in C /OpenCV - 6 months minimum experience in distributed software development in heterogeneous computing environment - Strong documentation skills - 6 months minimum experience working knowledge of optimization skills in embedded space - Familiarity with image sensor processing and computer vision as applied to cameras. - Knowledge of Intel GPU architecture. - Knowledge of OpenCL and OpenGL are strong pluses - Knowledge of RADAR and LIDAR technologies are strong pluses - Availability for at least 6 months; preferably 1 year for internship ','Engineering','USA-Arizona, Phoenix','','Full Time','Student/Intern','Temporary','Aug 31, 2015','Dec 31, 2015','Employees of the Internet of Things Solutions Group (IOTG) have an exciting opportunity before them: To grow Intel's leadership position in the rapidly evolving IoT market by delivering the best silicon, software and services that meet a wide range of customer requirements - from Intel® Xeon® to Intel® Quark®. The group, a fresh, dynamic collaboration between Intel's Intelligent Solutions Group and Wind River Systems, utilizes assets from across all of Intel in such areas as industrial automation, retail, automobiles and aerospace.
